title: About me
subTitle: about
whoIAm: Who I am, my skills, what I do
intro: I'm a Front-End developer born in Brazil, living in Argentina.
description: I care about site speed, user experience, cross browser compatibility, and of course, responsiveness (I always start projects in a mobile-first approach)
skillsList: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, NextJS, JSX, Bootstrap, Sass, Tailwind, Styled Components, VSCode, Git, Github, Figma, Slack.
thisSiteDescription: This site was created using: NextJs (SSG mode), Styled Components (for styling) and Next-i18next (for internationalization en / es). Hosted on Vercel. Google Lighthouse score: 98%.
eCommerceJsDescription: The second project I did during my Front-End career. Main tools / languajes: HTML, Javascript and SASS
eCommerceReactDescription: Third and last project during my Front-End Career. Main tools / languages: HTML, React, SASS and Styled Components
marsDescription: Project build using React, JSX, Styled Components and fetching data from Nasa's open api Mars Rovers
autocentroDescription: Real project for local business Autocentro. Project entirely made using HTML and SASS
